description: Purchase a reservation with configurations that match those of your Dedicated Host. You must have active Dedicated Hosts in your account before you purchase a reservation. This action results in the specified reservation being purchased and charged to your account.

parameters.name: HostIdSet
parameters.description: The IDs of the Dedicated Hosts with which the reservation will be associated. (string) ---

parameters.name: TagSpecifications
parameters.description: The tags to apply to the Dedicated Host Reservation during purchase. (dict) --- The tags to apply to a resource when the resource is being created. When you specify a tag, you must specify the resource type to tag, otherwise the request will fail. ResourceType (string) --- The type of resource to tag on creation. Tags (list) --- The tags to apply to the resource. (dict) --- Describes a tag. Key (string) --- The key of the tag. Constraints: Tag keys are case-sensitive and accept a maximum of 127 Unicode characters. May not begin with aws:. Value (string) --- The value of the tag. Constraints: Tag values are case-sensitive and accept a maximum of 256 Unicode characters.

nested_params.name: ResourceType
nested_params.description: The type of resource to tag on creation.

nested_params.name: Tags
nested_params.description: The tags to apply to the resource.

nested_params.name: Key
nested_params.description: The key of the tag. Constraints: Tag keys are case-sensitive and accept a maximum of 127 Unicode characters. May not begin with aws:.

nested_params.name: Value
nested_params.description: The value of the tag. Constraints: Tag values are case-sensitive and accept a maximum of 256 Unicode characters.

nested_items.name: ClientToken
nested_items.description: Unique, case-sensitive identifier that you provide to ensure the idempotency of the request. For more information, see Ensuring Idempotency.

nested_items.name: CurrencyCode
nested_items.description: The currency in which the totalUpfrontPrice and totalHourlyPrice amounts are specified. At this time, the only supported currency is USD.

nested_items.name: Purchase
nested_items.description: Describes the details of the purchase.

nested_items.name: CurrencyCode
nested_items.description: The currency in which the UpfrontPrice and HourlyPrice amounts are specified. At this time, the only supported currency is USD.

nested_items.name: Duration
nested_items.description: The duration of the reservation's term in seconds.

nested_items.name: HostIdSet
nested_items.description: The IDs of the Dedicated Hosts associated with the reservation.

nested_items.name: HourlyPrice
nested_items.description: The hourly price of the reservation per hour.

nested_items.name: InstanceFamily
nested_items.description: The instance family on the Dedicated Host that the reservation can be associated with.

nested_items.name: PaymentOption
nested_items.description: The payment option for the reservation.

nested_items.name: UpfrontPrice
nested_items.description: The upfront price of the reservation.

nested_items.name: TotalHourlyPrice
nested_items.description: The total hourly price of the reservation calculated per hour.

nested_items.name: TotalUpfrontPrice
nested_items.description: The total amount charged to your account when you purchase the reservation.
